name: XSOAR Incident Flow
template:
| Incident Playbooks(Ingestion) | Analysis Playbooks (Enrichment) | Containment Subplaybooks (Analyst/User Actions) |
|-------------------------------|---------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------|
| Cortex XDR Incident           | **Upon Trigger**                | Lock AD user account                            |
| Prisma Saas Alert             | Calculate Severity              | Lock AD service account                         |
| Prisma Cloud Alert            | Start SLA Timers                | EDL Block (IP/Domain/URL)                       |
| Okta Alert                    | Notification                    | PAN-DB re-categorization                        |
| WinEvent Alert                |                                 | Block email sender                              |
| Linux Alert                   | **Gather Details**              | Quarantine email                                |
| Proofpoint Alert              | User Enrichment                 | Quarantine files                                |
| G-Suite Alert                 | Host Enrichment                 | Quarantine device                               |
| GCP Alert                     | URL Enrichment                  | Disable project                                 |
| Support Requests              | Domain Enrichment               |                                                 |
| NGFW Alert                    | Email Address Enrichment        | **Eradication Playbooks**                       |
| Abuse Reports                 | File Enrichment                 | Re-image request                                |
| Onboarding/Offboarding        | IP Enrichment                   | Password Reset                                  |
| Expanse Alert                 | Related email search            | Search and destroy                              |
| Monitoring Alert              | Related log search              | External website takedown                       |
| Password Spray Alert          | Forensic capture                | Revoke physical badge access                    |
|                               | Ask user a question             | Kill sessions                                   |
|                               |                                 |                                                 |
|                               |                                 | **Post-Incident Metrics**                       |
|                               |                                 | Metrics incl. effort                            |
|                               |                                 | Record alert fidelity                           |
|                               |                                 | Timeline                                        |
